content: slip_stitch insert hook in st indicated yarn over and draw through all loops uk double_crochet/us single_crochet double_crochet/single_crochet insert hook in st indicated and draw up a loop two loops on hook yarn over draw through both loops on hook uk double_crochet/us single_crochet 2 sts together decrease/decrease insert hook in the st indicated and draw up a loop two loops on hook insert hook in the next st yarn over draw through three loops on hook cluster st = yarn over insert hook into next st pull up a loop three loops on hook yarn over yarn over insert hook into same st pull up a loop five loops on hook yarn over pull yarn through all five loops on hook pattern guidance invisible join the last st of your work where relevant should be finished off using the invisible join method  after the last stitch is completed do not join cut your yarn and pull the tail all the way through the stitch  then using a hook or a yarn needle thread insert under the loops of the stitch you wish to join to pull yarn through gently  then insert your hook or needle into the centre of the last stitch pull yarn through gently and weave in ends as usual © keep calm and crochet on u k 2014 3
